programDescriptor.fieldOfStudy: 0613 - Software and applications development and analysis
programDescriptor.supplementFieldofStudy: Information and Communication Technologies (ICTs) not further defined or elsewhere
programDescriptor.programExtraInfo: Programme Approved on behalf of SoC.

program_outcomes.preDesc: On successful completion of this programme the learner will be able to :

description.lineOne: Demonstrate fundamental knowledge and understanding of theory, concepts and methods in computing field, relating to Software Development.
description.lineTwo: Analyse, design, implement, test, deploy and document a technical software solution to solve complex problems.
description.lineThree: Apply best practices in designing computer solutions in a range of real-world contexts.
description.lineFour: Communicate effectively, present the results and defend the approach used in the development of a software solution.
description.lineFive: Critically and effectively analyse problems through both independent and collaborative efforts in order to develop computing solutions as part of a software development team.

coreSubject.moduleTitle: Computer Architecture Operating Systems and Networks
